A0: A deputy head teacher from Cardiff
RelatedSentence: A deputy head teacher from Cardiff who secretly filmed pupils going to the toilet has been jailed for five years .
Gareth Williams , 47 , earlier admitted 31 charges including nine of voyeurism and 20 of making indecent photos .
